function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Association between COVID-19 and chronic exposure to air pollution","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and severity","Mitigation":"Implementing stricter air pollution control measures, promoting public awareness, and improving ventilation systems","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, emission control technologies, and air quality monitoring devices","People":"Population of China, especially those residing in heavily polluted areas","Owner":"Government authorities, environmental agencies, and public health organizations"}]}
